metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of diamond bearing basalts in the southern margin of the North China Craton
metadata.titleCn: 华北克拉通南缘栏杆含金刚石玄武岩地球化学数据
metadata.description: Detailed geochemical analysis of the balustrade basalts has been carried out in this data set, including whole rock major / trace element, Sr nd Pb isotopic analysis, zircon U-Pb dating, Hf isotopic analysis and silicate melt inclusion major / trace element analysis. X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) was used to analyze the main elements, and the data error was less than 5%. Inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) was used to analyze trace elements in the whole rock, and the error of analysis results was less than 5-10%. The classification and genesis of the basalt can be effectively judged by the characteristics of major and trace elements. The whole rock SR nd Pb isotope was measured by mc-icp-ms. the results include 86Sr / 88Sr, 146nd / 144Nd, 206Pb / 204Pb, 207Pb / 204Pb and 208Pb / 204Pb ratios. SR nd Pb isotope can be used as a good tracer of magma source, which can trace the composition of basalt source. Compared with the whole rock composition, silicate melt inclusions captured by early crystallized minerals can represent the most initial melt composition. In this paper, the composition of single melt inclusion was analyzed by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS), and the analysis error was less than 5%. From the composition of melt inclusions, it can be judged that the initial melt of basalt is more refractory. Zircon, as a common accessory mineral, has been widely used in U-Pb dating. LA-ICPMS in-situ analysis technique was used to determine the zircon grains in the balustrade basalts. The dating results indicate that the balustrade basalts were formed in the Jurassic period. Zircon in-situ Hf isotope can effectively trace the source of zircon formation. In this paper, high-resolution Nu plasma II MC-ICP-MS is used to analyze zircon Hf isotope. In the process of analysis, 176hf / 177hf ratios of standard zircon (91500) and Penglai zircon are 0.282301 ± 0.000017(2 σ, N = 15) and 0.282915 ± 0.000014 (2 σ,  18), consistent with previous reports. Hf isotopic analysis results show that there are enriched components. Combined with the whole rock element and isotopic composition, it can be concluded that the balustrade alkaline basalt may be formed by partial melting of the overlying lithospheric mantle due to dehydration and metasomatism of subduction slab.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集对栏杆玄武岩进行了详细的地球化学分析，主要包括全岩主/微量元素、Sr-Nd-Pb同位素分析，锆石U-Pb定年、Hf同位素分析以及硅酸盐熔体包裹体主/微量元素分析。其中主量元素测试同时使用X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）进行分析，数据误差小于5%。全岩微量元素分析使用电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS），分析结果误差小于5-10%。通过主、微量元素组成特征，可以有效判断栏杆玄武岩分类及成因。全岩Sr-Nd-Pb同位素采用多接收电感耦合等离子质谱仪(MC-ICP-MS)完成，测试结果包括86Sr/88Sr、146Nd/144Nd、206Pb/204Pb、207Pb/204Pb以及208Pb/204Pb比值。Sr-Nd-Pb同位素作为很好的岩浆源区示踪剂，能够示踪栏杆玄武岩源区组成。相比于全岩成分，早期结晶的矿物捕获的硅酸盐熔体包裹体能够代表最初始的熔体组成。本文通过激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱仪LA-ICPMS分析测试了单个熔体包裹体组成，分析误差小于5%。通过熔体包裹体组成可以判断形成栏杆玄武岩的初始熔体具有更难熔的特征。锆石，作为常用的定年副矿物，已经被广泛用于U-Pb定年。通过LA-ICPMS原位分析技术，有效测定栏杆玄武岩中分选的锆石颗粒，其定年结果指示栏杆玄武岩形成于侏罗纪时期。锆石原位Hf同位素能够有效示踪形成锆石的物质来源，本文锆石Hf同位素采用高分辨率Nu Plasma II MC-ICP-MS进行分析，在分析过程中, 标准锆石(91500)和蓬莱（Penglai）锆石的176Hf/177Hf比值分别为0.282301±0.000017(2σ,n = 15)和0.282915±0.000014 (2σ, n=18)，与前人报道的一致。Hf同位素分析结果显示存在富集组分的加入，结合全岩元素和同位素组成进而判断栏杆碱性玄武岩可能是由于俯冲板片脱水交代上覆岩石圈地幔发生部分熔融形成的。
metadata.instructions:
File name: the data is stored in xlsx format, and its name is 202001 LG basalt Geo. 202001 represents the first set of data in 2020, LG represents balustrade area, basalt represents basalt, and geo represents geochemical data
Data reading mode: data can be read directly by Microsoft Excel and other software.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件名：数据以xlsx格式存储，名称为202001-LG-basalt-Geo，202001代表2020年第一个套数据，LG表示栏杆地区，basalt代表玄武岩，Geo代表地球化学数据，数据文件一共有5个子表，分别为Sr-Nd-Pb同位素、锆石Hf同位素、熔体包裹体成分、全岩主微量元素以及锆石U-Pb定年结果
数据读取方式：数据可以用microsoft excel等软件直接读取。

literatureList.titleEn: Initiation of the north china craton destruction: constraints from the diamond-bearing alkaline basalts from lan'gan, china.
literatureList.referenceEn: Wang, X., Xiao, Y., Sun, H., Wang, Y., Liu, J., Yang, K., Gu, H., Hou, Z., Tian, Y., Wu, W., & Ma, Y. (2020). Initiation of the North China Craton destruction: Constraints from the diamond-bearing alkaline basalts from Lan'gan, China. Gondwana Research, 80, 228-243. doi:10.1016/j.gr.2019.11.003

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used for analyzing the geochemical composition of basalts?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于分析玄武岩地球化学成分的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: detailed geochemical analyses, whole-rock major and trace element analysis, X-ray fluorescence spectrometry, inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, data accuracy of less than 5-10%, whole-rock Sr-Nd-Pb isotopes, multi-collector ICP-MS, zircon U-Pb dating, laser ablation ICP-MS, zircon Hf isotopes, high-resolution multi-collector ICP-MS, specific standardized ratios maintained
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 详细的地球化学分析，全岩主量和微量元素分析，X射线荧光光谱法，电感耦合等离子体质谱法，数据准确性小于5-10%，全岩Sr-Nd-Pb同位素，多接收器ICP-MS，锆石U-Pb定年，激光剥蚀ICP-MS，锆石Hf同位素，高分辨率多接收器ICP-MS，保持特定的标准化比率。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the error margin for major element analysis using X-ray fluorescence spectrometry in a dataset related to the geochemistry of diamond-bearing basalts in the southern margin of the North China Craton?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与华北克拉通南缘的含钻石玄武岩地球化学相关的数据集中，使用X射线荧光光谱法进行主要元素分析的误差范围是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic analysis in geochemical datasets related to basaltic rocks?
Definition.QuestionCn: Sr-Nd-Pb同位素分析在与玄武岩相关的地球化学数据集中的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic analysis serves as an effective tracer for determining the source composition of basaltic rocks. These isotopes, analyzed with multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICP-MS), provide valuable information on the magmatic source characteristics and help trace the origin of the basaltic material.
Definition.AnswerCn: Sr-Nd-Pb同位素分析作为一种有效的示踪工具，用于确定玄武岩的源组成。这些同位素通过多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICP-MS）进行分析，提供了有关岩浆源特征的宝贵信息，并有助于追踪玄武岩材料的来源。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the use of different isotopic analysis methods help in inferring the geological processes that led to the formation of basalts in the southern margin of the North China Craton?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同同位素分析方法的使用如何帮助推断导致华北克拉通南缘玄武岩形成的地质过程？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic analyses can effectively trace the composition of magma sources, indicating the geological processes involved. For example, the isotopic ratios such as 86Sr/88Sr, 146Nd/144Nd, and 206Pb/204Pb provide insights into the source materials and processes like mantle metasomatism or crustal contamination. Hf isotopic analysis of zircon can trace source materials and indicate the addition of enriched components, which combined with whole-rock elements and isotopes, suggest that the basalts may have formed through partial melting of the lithospheric mantle, influenced by dehydration of subducted slabs.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: Sr-Nd-Pb同位素分析的使用可以有效追踪岩浆源的组成，指示相关的地质过程。例如，86Sr/88Sr、146Nd/144Nd和206Pb/204Pb等同位素比率提供了关于源材料和诸如地幔改质或地壳污染等过程的见解。锆石的Hf同位素分析可以追踪源材料并指示富集成分的添加，这与全岩元素和同位素结合，表明这些玄武岩可能是通过岩石圈地幔的部分熔融形成的，受到俯冲板块脱水的影响。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of using multiple isotopic analyses such as Sr-Nd-Pb and Hf isotopes on understanding the source composition of mantle-derived rocks?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用多种同位素分析方法，如Sr-Nd-Pb和Hf同位素，来理解地幔衍生岩石的源成分的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using multiple isotopic analyses like Sr-Nd-Pb and Hf isotopes can provide a comprehensive understanding of the source composition of mantle-derived rocks by offering insights into the magma source characteristics, tracing the origin and evolution of magmatic processes, and indicating the involvement of different mantle components or crustal contributions. These analyses help in identifying the enrichment processes and the geochemical signatures that define the petrogenesis of the rocks.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用多种同位素分析，如锶-铷（Sr-Nd-Pb）和铪（Hf）同位素，可以全面了解源自地幔的岩石的成分特征，提供关于岩浆源特征的见解，追踪岩浆过程的起源和演化，并指示不同地幔成分或地壳贡献的参与。这些分析有助于识别富集过程和定义岩石成因的地球化学特征。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instruments and procedures are utilized to conduct geochemical analysis and isotopic dating of basalt samples in geological research?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中，进行玄武岩样品的地球化学分析和同位素测年所使用的仪器和程序包括哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Instruments such as X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) are used for major element analysis with less than 5% error, while inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) is employed for trace element analysis with an error margin of 5-10%. Multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (MC-ICP-MS) is used for whole-rock Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic analysis, and laser ablation ICP-MS (LA-ICPMS) is utilized for analyzing single melt inclusions and zircon U-Pb dating. High-resolution Nu Plasma II MC-ICP-MS is applied for in-situ zircon Hf isotope analysis.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 仪器如X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）用于主要元素分析，误差小于5%；而电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）用于微量元素分析，误差范围为5-10%。多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（MC-ICP-MS）用于全岩Sr-Nd-Pb同位素分析，激光剥蚀ICP-MS（LA-ICPMS）用于分析单个熔体包裹体和锆石U-Pb定年。高分辨率Nu Plasma II MC-ICP-MS用于原位锆石Hf同位素分析。
